svg.title: FO-06: Master Implementation Success Dashboard
svg.desc: Comprehensive success tracking dashboard showing mastery progression across all five principles, compound effect realization, team transformation metrics, and long-term value creation indicators.

g.text: Real-time transformation tracking across all principles
Milestone celebrations, team achievements, and transformation highlights
"Our team transformed from struggling with AI tools to
becoming the company's AI development center of
excellence. The compound effect is real!"
